Message: Believe you can and you're halfway there. – Theodore Roosevelt
You are stronger than you think.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
I am calm, I am in control, and I am capable.
I have survived 100% of my hardest days.
I choose to focus on what I can control.
It’s okay to take a break. Rest is productive too.
One breath at a time. That’s all you need right now.
